meanings.definition: Able to stick fast to a surface or object.
meanings.sent1: The adhesive tape held the picture on the wall securely.
meanings.sent2: The sticky glue was very adhesive and kept the pieces together.
meanings.sent3: The adhesive bandage was so sticky, it almost stuck to itself!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as adhesive as glue, spreading warmth to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The adhesive properties of the tape made it perfect for the job.

meanings.definition: A substance used for sticking objects together.
meanings.sent1: She applied the adhesive to the broken pieces to fix the vase.
meanings.sent2: The strong adhesive bonded the wood pieces firmly in place.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got its paws stuck in the adhesive trap.
meanings.sent4: The adhesive acted like a magical bond, connecting the parts seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The adhesive smelled like a mix of chemicals and strength.
